And the reason why I wear it is because

I'm on the board of this
amazing nonprofit organization
called "Kulture City."

So what they do is promote
acceptance for all those

with sensory needs,
like people with autism,
or pretty much anyone with sensory needs.

And they do great things
like install sensory rooms
in airports or stadiums,

so people with sensory
needs when they need it
could have access to it.
And because of them, people who are

attending loud events
like basketball games

can get the sensory back,
so they're not overwhelmed.
Great organization.

So if you want to get a
shirt and support them,
I'll put the link down below for ya.
